name: Path of the Trees
description:
Game Developers @Turkey group has arranged a game jam called geziJam to protest government's decisions, police violence against demonstrators in Taksim Gezi Park, Turkey. And I have developed Path of the Trees for this jam in 2 days.

Click here to see detailed information and a small devlog about game.
And click here to see/play/comment other games in geziJAM.
